1.content:
Well then, how shall we begin? Ah, what are you?

1.title: Who are you?

11.content: So, you like to work alone? I guess that has it advantages hehe. Are you male or female? I'll make two of each.
11.title: A Solo player

111.content:
Name: Ryu

Gender: Male

Height: 5'9"

Eye Color: Grey/Blue

Fighting Style: Varies

Specialty Weapons: Single-handed Swords or daggers, no shield.

Unique Skill: Living Shadow- When Ryu's HP hits half, his already high speed and stealth stats have a 50% jump in power, making him almost impossible to track.

Armour: Light amour, black in color with red highlights

Personality: Though Quite most of the time, Ryu is is very kindred spirit but will not hesitate to show you who's boss if you piss him off

So, Where should we start? at the beginning? Or a few years after?
111.title: Male (Mine!)

113.content:
S.A.O Character

Name:
Gender: Male
Fighting Preference: Sword and Shield
Preffered Weapon Type: Sabres
Unique Skill: Free Form Fighting

Description:

Cirothe stands at a height of 6' 5". Has a short style of hair as not to get in the way of his sight when fighting. Has a permanent 5 o'clock shadow. Has an aveage body that doesn't show off any real muscle or fat. His hair colour is a very dark brown bordering on black.
113.title: Cirothe's Description

1132.content: are you a boy or a girl?
1132.title: Other characters

11321.content:
Gender: Male
Fighting Style: Only one-handed sword combat
Specialty Wepons: One handed swords
Unique Skill: Silent Shadows; when ever its dark or hes in shadows he move silently





Riain is 16 has brown hair that covers his eyes wich are a deep blue in the real world the person that he loved was shot by a person at a mall so he is quick to help people. Riain is sometime ill tempered but he is a nice person. he is also a super shy person sence his lover died.
11321.title: Riain

113212.content:
Name: Hiei
Gender: Male
Height: 6'0 (72 Inches)
Weight: 135lbs (61.235 Kg)
Build: Slim
Age: 16
Fighting Style: Close Quarters Combat and Hand to Hand
Specialty Weapons:Knives and Daggers
Unique Skill:Godspeed; Doubles speed and reflex related stats

Hiei has medium length black hair, right eye black and left eye is light blue. Hiei wears light armor, (similar to that of the ANBU uniform from Naruto), carries combat knives on lower legs and right hip. Has concealed bladed weapons; a shoe blade (Right), and hidden blade (Left arm). Hiei is often very calm and collective, even in extraordinary situations. Hiei cares deeply for his comrades, and when threatened will show no mercy to his enemies. Somewhat timid when around new people and a bit on the weird side.

Hiei works as a solo mercenary player and is often hired by small guilds to assist in completing quests or to find rare items or other players. With larger guilds, Hiei usually works as security; protecting high ranking members of the guild. Hiei always sees his missions through to the end and is payed at the end of each mission. If betrayed by the guild that hired him, Hiei will not hesitate to kill the involved members (this is made clear to the clients in the very beginning before accepting services).
113212.title: someone else

1132122.content:
Name: Thirnton Krate
Sex: Male
Height: 5"7'
Weight: 155 lbs.
Fighting Style: Erratic, enhanced by remote sword control and haymakers with iron bracers
Specialty Weapons: Sword that can float near Thornton and be controlled by hand gestures with a special gauntlet, Adhesive Caltrops, Smoke Bombs, Scimitar, and a Crossbow
Skills: Genius Level Intellect, Insane Incorporated Movements, Parkour, and Fear Harnessing.

A 13-yr. old veteran American gamer, Thornton has been in S.O.A. for a month now, yet it has been three months since the crisis. Thornton, wanting to help, plugged in using a scavenged helmet and left the safety of the orphanage to go into the world of S.O.A. A kind, almost childish teen, Thornton prefers the company of his pet fox, Uno, who he jacked into S.O.A. as well, making a great companion due to the fact that the helmet allows conversation between players, allowing for communication between himself and Uno.

Not wanting to be forsaking others with his weird personality, Thornton goes solo, often rushing head on with a loose plan to keep him on track. At level 45, he is often escorting those in the lower levels, making sure all are alive and well. This scavenging allows for him to be a part-time treasure hunter, often searching the area around dead players for red pawned gear. He uses some hacking knowledge to constantly boost his gear's stats by merging the items. No friends, no enemies, Thornton loves everyone.
1132122.title: Thornton Krate, ready to be awesome!

11321221.content:
"Sweet Marah, I can't believe we found that much gold! Even for a veteran like me, this is a lot of gold, especially here in stage one!" I cry out in joy.

"Relax Thornton, it may be a lot, but we first need to get back to the high stages to really use it. Thanks to us and others, a lot of lower stage towns are empty. And if we warp there, we could land smack dab into a fight. Remember what happened a couple days ago?" Uno enquires.

"Yeah, I remember. We should stay here anyway, we could find a straggler. I hope we don't." I say worriedly.

All of a sudden...
11321221.title: Mid-gamer in N00b's country.

113212213.content:
I suddenly hear a shrill cry for help. Uno points me in the direction. I pick him up and dash to the area, only to find a straggler in the yellow health bar zone that is about to be attacked by a horde of monsters and… a player.

This player has white hair, gray eyes, and a stark complexion. His name is Roland, the infamous monster wrangler. They say he has a unique skill that allows him to control monsters, the more he controls the lower their level has to be. I have fought him before, even caught him in a trap I made with my special Innovator skill, which allows me to make things that aren't in the original armor and weapons directory, stuff that no one could ever dream of making.

"ROLAND! DON'T HURT THAT DEFENSELESS PLAYER! YOU'RE ONE OF THE BEST GUYS ON THE FRONT LINES!" I scream from my vantage point.

"Oh Thornton, will you ever learn?" He retorts as he shows me the figure of....
113212213.title: The dance of the mind!

1132122131.content:
~<Ryu POV>~

I was on one knee with my long sword stuck in the ground for support as I caught my breath. Roland and his pets had attacked me out of the blue, I guess he wanted to plunder my equipment. I reframed from grinning as I felt my ability, Living Shadow, kicking in. Whenever I get to half health, my speed and stealth stats skyrocket for a short time, approximately 2 minutes.

I looked up at Roland, who had his back turned to me as he spoke to the other player, a boy carrying a fox. I knew him, we fought together once, for a short time. He had a knack for creating amazing prices of weapons and armor. 'Note to self, ask him to make me a new sword when we're done here' I thought as I stood up silently and pulled my blade from the ground. I pulled up my hood which hid my face in a veil of shadow. I grinned as I saw Roland had his back turned, though his monsters were still paying attention. I sheathed my sword and took up a low stance, charging up my sword. I smirked as they growled at me. I ran foreword and was upon them in a blink of an eye. I released my attack and appeared behind them. I stood and sheathed my blade. When it went in with a click, the monsters erupted with slice wounds all over their bodies before dissolving completely.

I chuckled and turned to the other player "never judge a book by the cover bud." I said as an enraged Roland spun on me.
1132122131.title: Ryu (You're up ShadowMoon.)

choices: A bag of two thousand gold.
A weapon reminiscent of a grappling hook.
11321221311.content:
<Thornton's POV>

I stand on my vantage point watching in awe as Ryu kicks Roland's monsters' butts. I pull out one of my favorite items, and use it. Three seconds later Roland has a paralysis dart in his skin and I'm holding a smoking gun.

"Long time no see Ryu. Did you see that? I made a gun in this game. Thank you Innovator skill!" I exclaim.

"Thank you for vanquishing those vile beasts Ryu. If Thornton fought them he probably would have won but it'd be a slow moving fight." Uno explains.

I walk up to Ryu and hand him.....
11321221311.title: Weapons Master

113212213111.content:
~<Ryu's POV>~

I chuckled as I saw Roland fall flat on his face at my feet with a dart in his back. I smile up at Thornton and walk over to meet him. "Amazing work as usual pal. And your very welcome you adorable little fox." He laughed up until he caught sight of the sword in his hand starts to virtually drool.

"Where in the seven hells did you find THAT beauty?!" i exclaimed as I tentivly held out my hand* may I?" Upon receiving the blade I grunted a bit at the weight before grinning with an idea. I equipped the blade and jumped a good couple feet back from both Throntona and Roland before holding the word in one hand behind me, letting it hang just above the ground. I took a deep breath and charged the sword, swinging it fast in front of me which caused me to spin in place before adjusting the angle and jumping, making the baled do a viscous upward slash. I grinned like a maniac as I landed and rubbed along the blade.

"And what did I do to deserve this beauty?" I asked as I look at the inventor and fox.
113212213111.title: A heavy broad sword.

choices: Someone and/or something interrupts the answer.
1132122131111.content:
<Thornton's Pov>

"Just a simple thank you and an invitation to a battle." I explain.

"Thanks for calling me adorable." Uno says.

I nod. I pull out my heavy gauntlets and ready my floating sword.

"So, I'm gonna get straight to the point. No delicates in this beautiful forest. You in, or out?" I ask.
1132122131111.title: Simple as that.

11321221311111.content:
~<Ryu POV>~

I grinned broadly as I ttwrorled the blade in my hand a few times before stowing it away and equipping my favorite weapon, a 2 1/2 foot long katana. I then pulled out a healing crystal and healed up quickly. I looked at the fox and gave him and scratch behind the ears. "Well you are. As for you," I look up at Thornton "I never could pass up a nice challenge." I stood up and stepped backs few more paces. "1v1 10 hit win?" I asked as I pulled up the duel menu and set up the match, not sending till I got an answer.
11321221311111.title: Ryu is in.

113212213111112.content:
<Thornton's POV.>

"No. If you check that sword's stats you will see a nifty little enchantment I added on to it. In a duel, it doesn't kill but instead knocks someone out, kind of like in ALO which you couldn't know about. I have some programs of it with me." I explain.

I send an all or nothing duel invite.

"Winner gets my flying pack. Ready?" I ask.
113212213111112.title: Street Fighter

12.content: Are you apart of a known guild are you in your own?
12.title: A Guildsmen

choices: Decide the other members of the Blades of Octagram.
Wolfgang on a lower level killing some enemies.
At home with his two girlfriends.
122.content: The Blades of the Octagram were 8 SAO players that were apart of the front line raids along with the Knights of the Blood Oath. One of the members was a boy with a two handed mace that had short brown hair and brown eyes. He wore a fur helmet based off of a wolf's head and wore blue chain mail armor. He had a unique skill, "Thunder Smash" where if he smacked his mace or hammer on the ground it could stun enemies around him in a 8 foot radius for a few seconds allowing him to either run or take a heal crystal. He wasn't the strongest player of the 8 person guild, but the fact that they would only allow an 8 person cap suggested that the eight combined made up a powerful guild. He was named Wolfgang the Thunder Speaker.
122.title: Reader's choice

choices: Other members of the Blades of Octagram
1221.content: So, the Blades of the Octagram had 8 of the best SAO players when put together. One of which was the rare beast tamer, Stacy. She had a small coati beast that was her pet named Coat. She has blonde hair in a fishtail braid on the right side. Her bosom was adequately developed for a 17 year old girl. She wore a little red dress with a flared up collar. She also wore a pair of bracers and leg armor plates of black armor. Her eyes were blue and her left eye covered by a wide bang. She carried a sling and had the unique ability with speed shot, allowing one shot per 15 to go at super speed to be unavoidable.
1221.title: Decide the other members of the Blades of Octag...

13.content: Ah, a killer of your fellow players, well this will be interesting. Are you a member of Laughing Coffin or another, unknown guild, or a solo killer?
13.title: A Murderer

info.brief_description: Your story as a Sword Art Online player. What will you be? What will you do?
info.description:
Welcome to my world, of Sword Art Online. Here you can choose your own path and do as you wish in the world of S.A.O. almost anything goes, but I stress almost. Create your character and play through the world, meet the famous characters from the anime and explore the dungeons.

New A.L.O option inside

Rules:
1. Sexual content is allowed but it must be light.

2. Do NOT make your character over powered, I will warn you if I see such a mistake, Then I will delete if you do not heed the warning.

3. Your characters can have unique skills, but none like magic (Expect for ALO) or invincibility, unless you find a way around that like Kirito.

4. Creating your own weapons is aloud.

5. when creating a character give stats like name, gender, fighting style, specialty weapons, unique skill (If any) and so on. In ALO just add species and what type of magic you use

6.and finally, Have fun!


Enjoy the story, and your adventure!!!
